name: Five Nights at Freddy's NES STYLED
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's NES STYLED
description:
Welcome, welcome!

This is a retro-styled recreation of Five Nights at Freddy's made by Scott Cawthon and published on 2014. This game has been made for the Demake Jam!

INSTRUCTIONS:
  • Use the doors and lights to protect yourself from danger.
  • Use the cameras to see what's ahead of you.
  • Be aware of limited electrical power source!
  • Survive until 6 am!
CONTROLS:
  • A Key: A Button
  • S Key: B Button
  • ENTER/RETURN Key: START Button
WARNINGS:
  • THIS IS A FAN-MADE PROJECT CREATED FOR FUN PURPOSES ONLY, AND SHALL NOT BE SOLD IN ANY OCCASION.
  • THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS, LOUD NOISES AND LOTS OF JUMPSCARES.
